attributes.action: Child's bus fare for 16 and 17 year olds
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Ministry of Transport,
At this present moment of time bus and travel company's are within their rights to charge sixteen and seventeen year olds full adult bus fare.
This is unfair on sixteen and seventeen year olds as they are not yet adults as they are not entitled to the vote.
Therefore a change to the system is needed, either child's bus fare until eighteen or the vote at sixteen.
